phase3.thread.RemoveRefsAsyncTask



class RemoveRefsAsyncTask: phase3.thread.AsyncTask.AsyncTask!int.AsyncTask;
Removes references to all colors in a 2-dimensional RGBColor array.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 21, 2014

this(Display display, ColorManager colorManager, RGBColor[][] colors);
Creates a new RemoveRefsAsyncTask.

Params:
Display display The main Display of the application.
ColorManager colorManager The ColorManager of the application.
RGBColor[][] colors The RGBColors to remove references of.

protected void doInBackground();
Remove two references to all colors in the RGBColors array.
